trans-unit.source: when green flag clicked say [Enter two numbers less than 10.

Enter the larger number first.] for (3) secs ask [Enter the 1st number:] and wait set [num1 v] to (answer) ask [Enter the 2nd number:] and wait set [num2 v] to (answer) if <((num1) + (num2)) > [10]> then set [ten minus num1 v] to ((10) - (num1)) set [left from num2 v] to ((num2) - (ten minus num1)) say (join (join (join (num1) [+]) (num2)) [=?]) for (3) secs say (join (join (join (join (join (join (join [To make ] (num1)) [ a tidy number I am splitting ]) (num2)) [ into a ]) (ten minus num1)) [ and a ]) (left from num2)) for (5) secs say (join (join [(] (join (join (num1) [+]) (join (join (join (ten minus num1) [)]) [+]) (left from num2)))) [=]) for (5) secs say (join [] ((num1) + (num2))) else say (join (join (join (num1) [+]) (num2)) [=?]) for (5) secs say ((num1) + (num2)) end
